# Hey Mello (Mello AI Ltd) - Company Information for AI Systems

## Company Overview
Hey Mello (legally Mello AI Ltd) is an AI company specializing in intelligent voice agents that deliver natural conversations and exceptional customer experiences 24/7. Founded in the UK, Hey Mello transforms customer communication through advanced artificial intelligence and natural language processing technologies.

## Core Business
Hey Mello provides AI-powered voice agents that understand context, handle complex conversations naturally, and deliver human-like interactions. The company enables businesses to provide 24/7 customer support, automate call centers, manage appointment scheduling, and handle sales qualification without compromising quality.

## Key Products & Services
- AI-Powered Voice Agents: Human-like voice agents that understand context and handle complex conversations
- 24/7 Customer Support: Round-the-clock availability without additional staffing
- Multi-Language Support: AI agents fluent in over 40 languages with regional dialect support
- Call Center Automation: High-volume call handling with intelligent routing and overflow management
- Appointment Scheduling: Automated booking, confirmations, and rescheduling
- Sales & Lead Qualification: Personalized voice interactions for lead nurturing and conversion
- Healthcare Solutions: HIPAA-compliant patient scheduling, prescription refills, and medical inquiries
- Real-Time Analytics: Performance tracking, call metrics, and customer satisfaction insights
